Welcome to kiPL’s documentation!¶

Contents:

kiPL.py Generate a PL from a netlist.

There is some special coding that is used here. The fields of the parts need to be named with particular names for this program to work. This is a setup thing for Kicad and only needs to be done once. The names must match exactly.
